pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Wildlife Data with Detection Error // Models for analyzing site occupancy and count data models with detection error, including single-visit based models (Lele et al. 2012 doi:10.1093/jpe/rtr042, Moreno et al. 2010 doi:10.1890/09-1073.1, Solymos et al. 2012 doi:10.1002/env.1149, Denes et al. 2016 doi:10.1111/1365-2664.12818), conditional distance sampling and time-removal models (QPAD) (Solymos et al. 2013 doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12106, Solymos et al. 2018 doi:10.1650/CONDOR-18-32.1), and single bin QPAD (SQPAD) models (Lele Solymos 2025). Package development was supported by the Alberta Biodiversity Monitoring Institute and the Boreal Avian Modelling Project.
